channel.title: Weather on J. Hagedorn
channel.description: Recent content in Weather on J. Hagedorn

item.title: Weathering
item.description: As a way to potentially incorporate weather data into poems and as a way to better get to know the forest and meadows by my house, I wanted to find a way to pull in historical weather information for a specific set of geographical coordinates. I’m using the darksky package in R: library(darksky); library(tidyverse);library(plotly) First, I’ll set my API key, available by signing up for a DarkSky developer account.
